knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
data = read.csv('2022.csv')
data$Goals = as.double(data$Goals)
data$Assists = as.double(data$Assists)
data$Sh.90 = as.double(data$Sh.90)
data$G.Sh = as.double(data$G.Sh)
data$atttouch = data$Att.3rd/data$Touches
data$VotePer = data$Vote / sum(data$Votes)
model1 = lm(data = data, VotePer ~ log(sqrt(Goals)) + Assists + Sh.90 + G.Sh-1+Trophies)
model2 = lm(data = data, VotePer ~ Tackle + Blocks + Interceptions + Clearances-1)
model3 = lm(data = data, VotePer ~ log(Touches) + log(Def.3rd) + log(Mid.3rd) + atttouch -1)
summary(model1)
model2
model3
plot(model2)
```



```{r}
?predict
new <- tibble(Goals=c(20.0), Assists=c(12.0), Sh.90=c(2.3), G.Sh=c(0.1))
tibs = data.frame(data[4,]) %>%
  select(Touches, Def.3rd, Mid.3rd, atttouch)
prediction = predict(object = model3, newdata = tibs)
prediction
```
